## Summary
What problem does this solve or what capability does it add?

## Proposed solution
Describe the approach or API change you envision.

## Alternatives considered
List any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Sample data / scenarios
Provide example CSV shape, sizes, encodings, or usage scenarios (e.g., SqlBulkCopy, streaming).

## Additional context
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
